title: Green Globes Certified, Covered Parking Available, Package Locker Room
posting_body: ["Tucked away in Southwest Las Vegas Mountain's Edge neighborhood, Mountain Gate & Mountain Trails are here to offer residents a fresh take on luxury living.", 'Updated with modern finishes and designer touches, our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Exploration Peak Park supply just the retreat youve been searching for.', '-Business Center with Workstations and WiFi', '-Our apartment homes are cleaned only with organic products!', "-Located in Mountain's Edge Master Planned Community", '-Poolside Barbecue Grills with Seating', '-Elevator Access in Select Buildings', '-Package Locker Room', '-Expansive Community Walking and Biking Path to Exploration Park', '-Covered Parking Available', '-24-Hour Athletic Centers Featuring Cardio, Free Weights, and Yoga Room', '-Two Vibrant Clubhouses with Plasma TV/DVD Player and Java Bar', '-Free WiFi Access in Common Areas', '-Move-in Deposit Free with Jetty', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
